mapper.insert: insert into m_user(u_userid, u_userpw, u_name, u_nick, u_profileimg, u_imgpath, u_local) values (#{u_userid}, #{u_userpw}, #{u_name}, #{u_nick}, #{u_profileimg , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_imgpath , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{u_local})
mapper.select: select count(*) from m_user where u_userid=#{u_userid}
select count(*) from m_user where u_nick=#{u_nick}
select * from m_user where u_userid=#{u_userid} and u_userpw=#{u_userpw}
mapper.insert: update m_user set u_authkey=#{u_authkey} where u_userid=#{u_userid}
mapper.update: update m_user set u_admin = 'Y' where u_userid = #{u_userid} and u_authkey = #{u_authkey}
